title: Threat of piracy: use of armed guards on UK flagged ships
description: Interim guidance covering the use, in exceptional circumstances, of armed guards on UK flagged ships to defend against piracy.

title: Modify goods vehicles before they're registered
description: How changes to goods vehicles before they're registered will be approved by the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency.

title: Exemption from heavy goods vehicle (HGV) annual testing (V112G)
description: Application for vehicles that are exempt from the HGV annual test.

title: [Withdrawn] Accessible train and station design for disabled people
description: Standards and guidance for accessibility at railway stations.

title: 3D laser scanning technology: police authority contribution application
description: Application for police authorities to apply for crash site 3D laser scanning technology funding plus the competition terms and conditions.

title: Proposed Designation Orders implementing the Port Security Regulations 2009 (SI 2009/2048)
description: Consultation seeking views and comments from those affected by the contents of the Designation Orders proposed for each of the listed ports.

title: Additional Provision (September 2014) Plans and Sections
description: These plans and sections provide details of the proposed works to support Additional Provision (September 2014).

title: Become a traffic examiner
description: How to become a traffic examiner, including the recruitment process, assessments and training.

title: BSOG reform letter: 8 January 2013
description: Third letter sent to all English operators regarding the bus subsidy reform.

title: Dee Estuary and Mostyn Docks harbour revision order: decision
description: Agreement of harbour revision orders, with modifications, for Dee Estuary and Mostyn Docks, to implement the marine code and other issues.
